es.ull.isaatc.function
Class PolynomialFunction

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.isaatc.function.TimeFunction
      es.ull.isaatc.function.PolynomialFunction

public class PolynomialFunction
extends TimeFunction

Represents a polynomic function: a1·x^n-1 + a2·x^n-2 + ... + an

Author:
Roberto Muñoz
